sentences.english: The 3rd, be good at thinking, baconian solution inscribes train of thought and method.
sentences.chinese: 第三，善於思考，歸納解題思路與方法。

sentences.english: So he believes in solving problems with a pencil until high school.
sentences.chinese: 因此他認爲最好用筆頭解題直到中學爲止。

sentences.english: If you love puzzle-solving, I bet you will love Infernal Affairs.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愛益智解題，我打賭你會愛上無間道。

sentences.english: As Darren says, “It’s more like a problem solving exercise.”
sentences.chinese: 就像Darren說的，“它更像是解題練習。”

sentences.english: In this paper, the definition of reductio ad absurdum, logical principles and problem-solving steps.

sentences.english: As an example, the 6R arm is given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文以6R機械手爲例說明了具體的解題過程。

sentences.english: That was even better because I got paid to teach people problem-solving skills.
sentences.chinese: 這樣更好了，因爲教大家解題技巧有報酬可拿。

sentences.english: I believe I've isolated the algorithim for making friends.
sentences.chinese: 我想我解開了交友解題步驟。

sentences.english: Physics students in solving problems before the concept of the impact of research rare at.

sentences.english: The only way to really learn how to do problems is work lots of them.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何解題的唯一方法就是做更多的題。

sentences.english: The way of solving exercise problems reflectively in the basic meaning of "study by researching".
sentences.chinese: 解題的反思，包含着“研究性學習”的基本內涵。

sentences.english: If you could do the problem solving, you're going to do fine.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能解題，當然很好。
